channel.title: [PI] a little help please
channel.description:
Ok just 1 question.
I have a slayerpoint store and a pvp point exchange store but, how would i change the prices of the items in them cuz its not in Prices.cfg
PLEASE AND THANK YOU!

item.title: [PI] a little help please
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Go to shopassitant

look for

public int getSpecialItemValue(int id) {

here is an example from a source I got on my pc

case 1040:
case 1038:
case 1046:
case 1048:
case 1050:
case 1053:
case 1055:
case 1057:
return 200;

the case is the item id ( so it will be in this order in the shop)
the return is the value amount ( so all the items above that one return at that price. To make several different values amounts you have to make several case/returns.

then you can add the value you desire.

You should double check all the values in there as well, if you have a newer source like Ihybrid or something a lot of them have these stores and the values though some may be set to 0 which would be free so you need to change that.

Read full topic
